name: Vasco Xu
blurb: Vasco is a PhD student in Computer Science. His research explores the intersection of machine learning & adaptive sensing systems.

name: Chenfeng Gao
blurb: Chenfeng (Jesse) is a PhD student in Technology and Social Behavior. His research focuses on immersive experiences to bridge physical and virtual worlds

name: Yiquan Li
blurb: Yiquan is a PhD student in Computer Science. His research focuses on machine learning for wearable devices that interact with the physical world and human users.

name: Xuanyou Liu
blurb: Xuanyou (Zed) is a Ph.D. student in Computer Science whose research focuses on the intersection of Internet of Things (IoT) technologies with multimodal sensing systems.

name: Aidan Bradshaw
blurb: Aidan is a PhD student exploring on device Machine Learning and behavioral sensing systems for digital health, activity understanding, and affective computing.

name: Taeyoung Yeon
blurb: Taeyoung is a pre-doctoral researcher developing multimodal machine learning, sensing and interaction techniques for XR and ambient environments.

name: Bishnu Dev
blurb: Bishnu is a visiting scholar, interested in machine learning theory and its applications.

name: Xi-Aan Loh
blurb: Xi-Aan is a CS undergraduate researching motion capture and 3D pose estimation.

name: Suril Mehta
blurb: Suril is a visiting scholar investigating deep learning techniques for adaptive sensing, representation learning, and real-time human understanding.

name: Naoto Nishida
blurb: Naoto is a visiting PhD student from the University of Tokyo researching AI-assisted communication and learning systems, bridging education, cognition, and intelligent interfaces.

name: Sungheon Park
role: now Senior ML Engineer at Lucid Motors

name: Hongyu Mao
role: now PhD at University of Washington

name: Anjie Yang
role: now AI Engineer at Gradient Network
